column5: Anyone up for this years Salary cap pool. Had a blast last season and hope we can get a good bunch of guys together. We had some issues with people paying up at the end of the season so any thoughts on this year?  last year we did 25 bucks worth of lures or a gift certificate to a fishing store.  Who is game?  PS May not sit Micheal Vick week 1
CH, I am ready to donate $25 to someone's tackle box again.  Count me in.
25 is a good prize for sure.. have 3 so far
I'm in again just remind me as we get closer. I don't mind donating to someone else's fishing gear fund again.
